This test checks completion related to basic literals.

-- flags --
-ignore_extra_diags

-- basiclit.go --
package basiclit

func _() {
	var a int // something for lexical completions

	_ = "hello." //@complete(re"()\\.")

	_ = 1 //@complete(re"() \\/\\/")

	_ = 1. //@complete(re"()\\.")

	_ = 'a' //@complete(re"()\\' ")
}
